did.unittitle: Letter of Julien Green to "Cher Monsieur" 1940 May 6

scopecontent.p: Writes to a director of the Editions Hyperien concerning negotiations for a possible book to be written by Green about Georges Du Mesnil de la Tour. The study was never published, and negotiations may have been interrupted by Green's departure from Europe to the United States. The first section (6 mai 1940) served to introduce the second section (24 avril 1940), which was a copy of a letter sent earlier.
